channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Primary for New Jersey Seat Is First House Race in Pivotal Year
item.description: Eleven candidates are running in a special primary election on Thursday to fill Gov. Mikie Sherrill’s former seat. They include a former member of Con...

item.title: Measles continues to spread in the US, but with some letup
item.description: As South Carolina's outbreak grows to 876 confirmed cases, vaccinations in the state surged in January. Cases have also been reported in two ICE deten...

item.title: How Hochul Improved Her Prospects and Hurt an Adversary Along the Way
item.description: Gov. Kathy Hochul of New York has warded off most challenges to her re-election, but still faces one from her own deputy, Lt. Gov. Antonio Delgado.

item.title: Trump Brings Out the Worst in Everyone
The Winter Olympics get 8 new events, including the first new sport in decades
item.description: Ski mountaineering will make its Olympic debut this year, the first winter sport to do so since 2002. Skeleton, luge, ski jumping and moguls are also ...

item.title: What to Know About the Disappearance of Savannah Guthrie’s Mom, Nancy

item.title: Team USA settles in to athletes' villages, 'smash' pizzas

item.title: 'More relevant every day' in the U.S.: A filmmaker documented Russia's journalists
item.description: Julia Loktev's documentary My Undesirable Friends follows young independent journalists covering Putin's invasion of Ukraine.

item.title: When the Cold Turns Deadly, What Should New York City Do?
item.description: Seventeen New Yorkers have died after exposure to frigid temperatures since Jan. 24, raising questions about how Mayor Zohran Mamdani has managed the ...

item.title: Homan to draw down agents in Minnesota. And, U.S.-Russia nuclear arms deal expires
item.description: U.S. border czar Tom Homan says 700 federal agents will be leaving Minnesota. And, the New START Treaty between the U.S. and Russia expired today.

item.title: ‘My Crazy Friend’: The Royals Who Stayed Close to Epstein

item.title: In Afghanistan, a Trail of Hunger and Death Behind U.S. Aid Cuts
item.description: Afghanistan has plunged deeper into a crisis marked by levels of child hunger unseen in 25 years and the closure of almost 450 health centers.

item.title: Venezuela Said to Detain Maduro Allies Targeted by the U.S.
item.description: The questioning of the politically connected businessmen, Raúl Gorrín and Alex Saab, signaled deepening cooperation between the two nations.
